MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH66 postcode area of Ellesmere Port, affecting properties in School Lane, Welsh Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:33PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a kite on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 4:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:24PM on 5th April 2021.
